thig2.7:1.1: I rejoice in the host of gods,
thig2.7:1.4: on the fourteenth and the fifteenth days,
thig2.7:2.1: and the eighth day of the fortnight,
thig2.7:2.2: as well as on the fortnightly special displays.
thig2.7:2.3: Today I eat just once a day,
thig2.7:2.4: my head is shaven, I wear the outer robe.
thig2.7:2.5: I don’t long for the host of gods,
thig2.7:2.6: for stress has been removed from my heart.
